Row.Text: Together, our people will grow strong under the light of God.
Forgive me. Ethiopia has not been free for so long by making hasty agreements with foreigners.
I offer you the friendship of the line of Solomon, and the Lion of Judah!
You are on the right side of history.
You are on the wrong side of history.
Вам не відомо, що іудейський лев завжди рве свого супротивника? Добре, ви це затямите, досить скоро.
Your actions insult the people of Ethiopia, and for that you must pay a heavy price.
Talk to your delegation upon their return, and they will tell you of the beauty of the Roof of Africa.
We don't need any.
Ethiopia sends you coffee, injera bread, and our warm wishes.
Your rule is a disgrace, your words are lies, and I will show the world your treacherous heart.
(Звинувачення) Ваші слова не шанобливі? Всі ваші дії оманливі? Я не бачу жодної спокути за це.
Я Менелік, іудейський лев, роду Соломона, Імператор Ефіопії. Вітаю вас.
We have spread a wide table with injera and laid upon it tibs and kitfo. Will you share a meal with us?
Yes.
У дусі підтримки дружби, я повідаю вам де мій дім, якщо ви зробити теж саме.
I am pleased to see you once again.
I am pleased you find comfort in flat land, for the hills are mine.
Високогір'я належать мені по праву та звичаєм мого народу. Ви краще б селилися деінде.
Won't you help me sing these songs of freedom?
By the grace of God, let us have peace.
Ethiopia remains unconquered and her soldiers still long for battle.
This war hurts both our people. Let us end it.
Move freely through the lands of Ethiopia. But mind the lions.
We are independent and free. And we can say no to you.
Our troops have business across your lands. May they pass?
Do you think that you can frighten me? Move your troops at once!
My forces are where they are for good reason.
Friends do not need armed troops on each others' borders. I will withdraw.
Do you think God abandoned Ethiopia? Do you think his favor rests on you? Do not gloat in your victory today.
Get this paltry offer out of my sight.
Чесний обмін стане кожному з нас у пригоді.
